sara-dialog.QUE_BOM:
I'm glad you accepted my help.
How can I help you?
sara-dialog.AGENDAMENTO: How do you want to find your appointment?
sara-dialog.CENTRALIZE_ROSTO_NA_TELA: Center your face on the screen
sara-dialog.CONFIRMACAO:
I'll tell you arrived.
Please check the information shown on the screen, just in case
sara-dialog.DESCULPE_ESCOLHER_OPCOES:
Sorry, we could not find an appointment for you at this moment
How about trying one of these options?
